The consequences of bad deeds [mn82:42.5: Someone of little wisdom, placing faith in them, also enters a womb and the world beyond.
After departing, in the world beyond, people are punished for their own bad deeds.
The reasons for going forth (a causal ch: Seeing danger in the many kinds of sensual stimulation
Seeing fruit falls from a tree, so people fall, young and old, when the body breaks up.
The ascetic life is guaranteed to be better.
